des: "This splendid mixture of liquors that everyone has in the back of their liquor cabinet collecting dust looks like chocolate milk, but is far from it. My friends and I came up with it one night when we did not have the right ingredients for another drink. All of our ladies said that it should be a regular drink at all our parties."
ins: In a cocktail shaker, shake together vodka, hazelnut liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, and coffee flavored liqueur with several cubes of ice. Strain into a glass filled with ice cubes.
